radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive heterotopic ossification involving soft tissues and muscles surrounding the bilateral humeri and proximal ulnae, bilateral femurs, and bilateral tibias/fibulas.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Computed tomography of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive ossifications of the muscles including the right latissimus dorsi, left scalene, bilateral pectoralis, bilateral external oblique abdominal, right iliacus, bilateral gluteal, left adductor, and left hamstring; involvement of the subcutaneous tissues of the right upper back and left lower quadrant of the abdomen, left posterior sacral region, bilateral hips, and along the fascia superficial to the erector spinae muscles, extending to the skin; no evidence of pulmonary fibrosis. No abnormal ossifications in the bony structures.
